thread.title: Harvey and Murphy lead Mets over Cubs 4-2 in NLCS opener (Yahoo Sports)
thread.title_full: Harvey and Murphy lead Mets over Cubs 4-2 in NLCS opener (Yahoo Sports)

author: ASFN Admin
title: Harvey and Murphy lead Mets over Cubs 4-2 in NLCS opener (Yahoo Sports)
text: Posts: 54,338 Harvey and Murphy lead Mets over Cubs 4-2 in NLCS opener (Yahoo Sports) Matt Harvey, Daniel Murphy and the New York Mets have a mind to make some history of their own, the kind that would break Chicago Cubs hearts one more time. Harvey delivered the big-game performance he's been pining for, Murphy took his latest star turn on the October stage and the Mets beat the Chicago Cubs 4-2 Saturday night in their NL Championship Series opener. After eliminating rival St. Louis and streaking into New York with 12 wins in 13 games, the power-hitting Cubs and their young sluggers were stopped cold on a chilly night at Citi Field.
